entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 17 March 2023
